title: Office 365 Automation | Tietronix
description: Led the development and automation of employee data processing workflows by creating PowerShell scripts to calculate and convert hours worked for 1,000+ records, reducing manual effort by 90% and improving team productivity.
Directed cross-functional collaboration with HR, Finance, and IT teams to integrate automated processes, enhancing real-time data accessibility and improving interdepartmental alignment.
Streamlined reporting systems by designing and implementing scripts that updated Excel spreadsheets with processed employee data, reducing reporting time by 70% and enabling faster decision-making.
Enhanced  data accessibility by leveraging Microsoft Graph API to automate synchronization of employee data with SharePoint Online, improving team access and collaboration by 50%.
Ensured data accuracy and operational efficiency by implementing robust validation processes, achieving 99% accuracy, and saving 20+ hours monthly in manual corrections and data entry.
Delivered a scalable, user-centric solution capable of handling large datasets with zero downtime, directly enhancing operational efficiency and empowering teams with reliable tools.

title: Hawks Transport App | University of Houston â€“ Clear Lake
description: Designed and developed a real-time shuttle tracking mobile application using Swift and Xcode, enhancing campus transportation efficiency for over 1,000 students and staff.
Integrated Google Firebase for robust database management, ensuring 99.9% uptime, real-time data synchronization, and seamless access to live shuttle locations.
Implemented GPS-based tracking to display accurate shuttle locations and estimated arrival times, improving user convenience and reducing wait times.
Developed an intuitive UI/UX design that allowed users to view schedules, set favorite routes, and receive notifications for shuttle arrivals or delays.
Leveraged Firebase Cloud Firestore to manage real-time data updates and user requests efficiently, minimizing network latency.
Conducted rigorous testing with students and faculty, incorporating feedback to refine features and enhance overall app performance.
Successfully improved campus mobility and accessibility, reducing transportation-related complaints and enhancing the student experience.
